select poi.id, poi.space_id, poi.vehicle_id, poi.start_date, poi.end_date, poi.total_time, poi.price, poi.total_price, poi.pay_date, si.name as spaceName, si.`space` as spaceAddress, vi.vehicle_number, vi.images as vehicleImages, vi.vehicle_no, vi.vehicle_color, ui.code, ui.name, ui.images, ui.phone, ui.email from park_order_info poi left join space_info si on (si.id = poi.space_id) left join vehicle_info vi on (vi.id = poi.vehicle_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = vi.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parkOrderInfo.spaceName},'%')
AND vi.vehicle_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parkOrderInfo.vehicleNumber},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parkOrderInfo.userName},'%')
order by poi.pay_date desc
SELECT IFNULL( SUM( pr.total_price ), 0 ) FROM park_order_info pr WHERE DATE_FORMAT( pr.pay_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
SELECT IFNULL( count( 1 ), 0 ) FROM park_order_info oi WHERE DATE_FORMAT( oi.pay_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
SELECT IFNULL( SUM( pr.total_price ), 0 ) FROM park_order_info pr WHERE DATE_FORMAT( pr.pay_date, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y')
SELECT IFNULL( count( 1 ), 0 ) FROM park_order_info oi WHERE DATE_FORMAT( oi.pay_date, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(SUM(pr.total_price), 0) AS amount FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN park_order_info pr ON ( DATE_FORMAT( pr.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' )) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(COUNT(oi.id), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN park_order_info oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' )) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
